directions: Sift together flour, sugar, and spices; stir in peel and almonds.  Cut in margarine till mixture resembles coarse crumbs.  Stir in egg and milk till mixture forms a ball; chill.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Roll out to about 1/8-inch thickness.  Cut into circles 1-3/4 inches in diameter.  Place on ungreased cookie sheet; sprinkle with sugar.  Bake  for 6 to 8 minutes until edges are brown.
title: Cardamom Cookies
